name: Rites of Passage and Daily Life in the Middle Ages (formerly HIS323Y1)
description: Reflecting on the life cycle and rites of passage in the medieval period gives the opportunity to study the daily lives of peasants, nobles, monks, nuns, and burghers, and to observe from an interesting angle the differences between female and male life experiences.
prerequisites: A course specifically on the Middle Ages such as HIS220Y1
